name: Minotaur's Labyrinth (Mr Maheros In Low Poly)
name_original: Minotaur's Labyrinth (Mr Maheros In Low Poly)
description:
A new take to the myth of Theseus and the Minotaur.

In the game you are Theseus and need to find a way to the center of the labyrinth where the Minotaur is, and kill it.

Collect all the 8 notes for the secret ending.
